body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.  
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of personal information.  
Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand.
The conversation should be at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time and end the conversation.
Return the conversation formatted like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Good day! My name is Kyle Watson, and I'm here representing Acme Law Firm. Can I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kelly! How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having an issue related to shipping, and it's making me a bit nervous.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Kelly. To better assist you, may I have your account number and the tracking number of your shipment?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is zero nine five two and the tracking number is TV five eight seven six US.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kelly. Give me a moment to look into this for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I have checked the details and it seems there was a delay in the shipping process. We are addressing this issue and your package should be on its way shortly.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Kyle. I appreciate your help with this problem.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that'll be all, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kelly. Have a great day!
